snippet: Pacers point guard George Hill sustained a concussion in the first half of Game 4 after a collision with Knicks center Tyson Chandler.
abstract: Indiana Pacers point guard George Hill sustains a concussion in the first half of Game 4 after a collision with New York Knicks center Tyson Chandler.
lead_paragraph: Pacers point guard George Hill sustained a concussion in the first half of Game 4 after a collision with Knicks center Tyson Chandler.

headline.seo: Pacers’ George Hill Misses Game 5 With Concussion
